etymology.description: 乌鲁木齐(烏魯木齊) (Wūlǔmùqí, "Urumqi") + 市(市) (shì, "city") = Urumqi city
etymology.interpretation: 乌鲁木齐(烏魯木齊) (Wūlǔmùqí, "Urumqi") is the name of the capital city of the Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region in China. The term 市(市) (shì, "city") denotes it as an urban area. Urumqi is historically significant as a major hub on the northern route of the ancient Silk Road.

examples.chinese: 乌鲁木齐市魅力无限(烏魯木齊市魅力無限)。
乌鲁木齐市位于新疆中部(烏魯木齊市位於新疆中部)，经济发展迅速(經濟發展迅速)。
examples.pinyin: Wūlǔmùqí Shì wèiyú Xīnjiāng zhōngbù, jīngjì fāzhǎn xùnsù.
examples.english: Urumqi is located in the central part of Xinjiang, and its economy is developing rapidly.

examples.chinese: 乌鲁木齐市交通便利(烏魯木齊市交通便利)，文化活动丰富(文化活動豐富)。
examples.pinyin: Wūlǔmùqí Shì jiāotōng biànlì, wénhuà huódòng fēngfù.
examples.english: Urumqi has convenient transportation, and cultural activities are abundant.
